::Zardus/DevilDuer::

DevilDuer looks at Wolfgang as he recieves Zardus' order to meet him at the 
new pred ship.

"Do you want me to leave Wolfgang here?" He asks Zardus over the comm-link.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus lands in the forest near Set's and Shuko's ship as he recieves 
DevilDuer's transmission. "No," He replies, "Guard him. I might kill him when 
I get back."

He looks at the strange ship from his hiding point, waiting for Nemesis and 
the rest of the alliance to arrive.
